entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow mixed with rain changing to rain late this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
